aboutPage.historyIntro: Founded in 2018, Digital Hub Agency was born with the purpose of democratizing access to quality digital solutions. We started as a small team of developers and designers passionate about technology and today we are a reference in digital transformation for companies of all sizes.

hero.title: About Digital Hub Agency
hero.subtitle: Transforming ideas into innovative digital solutions since 2018

story.title: Our Story
story.description: Founded in 2018, Digital Hub Agency was born with the purpose of democratizing access to quality digital solutions. We started as a small team of developers and designers passionate about technology and today we are a reference in digital transformation for companies of all sizes.

mvv.title: Mission, Vision and Values
mvv.missionText: Empower companies through innovative digital solutions that generate real and sustainable results.
mvv.visionText: To be recognized as Brazil's leading digital agency, a reference in innovation and excellence in service.

team.subtitle: Specialized professionals passionate about what they do

teamMembers.designBio: Creative designer focused on user experience and impactful visual interfaces.

introduction.title: 1. Who We Are
introduction.p1: AgênciaDigital Hub (Tax ID: xx.xxx.xxx/xxxx-xx), based in João Pessoa, PB - Brazil, is a company specialized in innovative digital solutions.
introduction.p2: This Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use, store and protect your personal information in accordance with applicable data protection regulations.

dataCollection.title: 2. Data We Collect
dataCollection.p1: We collect different types of information to provide and improve our services:

items.personal: Personal data: name, email, phone, position and company
items.usage: Usage data: pages visited, browsing time, traffic source
items.technical: Technical data: IP address, browser type, device used

items.provide: Provide our services and respond to your requests
items.improve: Improve our products and user experience
items.communicate: Communicate with you about our services and news

cookies.title: 4. Cookies and Similar Technologies
cookies.p1: We use cookies to improve your experience on our website, analyze traffic and personalize content.
cookies.p2: You can manage your cookie preferences through your browser settings.

thirdParty.title: 5. Third Party Sharing
thirdParty.p1: We do not sell, rent or share your personal information with third parties, except when necessary for service provision or legal compliance.

dataRetention.title: 6. Data Retention
dataRetention.p1: We retain your personal data only for the time necessary to fulfill the purposes described in this policy or as required by law.

items.access: Request access to your personal data
items.rectification: Request correction of incorrect or incomplete data
items.erasure: Request deletion of your personal data

changes.title: 8. Changes to This Policy
changes.p1: We may update this Privacy Policy periodically. We will notify about significant changes through our communication channels.

contact.title: 9. Contact
contact.p1: To exercise your rights or clarify doubts about this policy, contact us:

introduction.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
introduction.p1: By accessing and using the AgênciaDigital Hub website, you agree to comply with and be bound by these Terms of Use.
introduction.p2: If you do not agree with any part of these terms, you should not use our services.

use.title: 2. Permitted Use
use.p1: You may use our website to:

items.license: View information about our services and company
items.modifications: Access educational content and informational materials

content.title: 3. Website Content
content.p1: All content on our website, including text, images, logos and design, is owned by AgênciaDigital Hub or its licensors.
content.p2: Reproduction, distribution or modification of content without prior written authorization is prohibited.

accounts.title: 4. User Accounts
accounts.p1: Some features may require account creation. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your credentials.
accounts.p2: You must provide accurate information and keep your data updated.

intellectual.title: 5. Intellectual Property
intellectual.p1: We respect intellectual property rights and expect our users to do the same:

items.copyright: All copyrights are protected by law
items.trademarks: Registered trademarks cannot be used without authorization
items.use: Unauthorized use may result in legal action

userContent.title: 6. User Content
userContent.p1: By submitting content through forms or other means, you grant us a license to use this information according to our Privacy Policy.
userContent.p2: You are responsible for the content you share and guarantee that you have the necessary rights.

privacy.title: 7. Privacy
privacy.p1: The processing of your personal data is governed by our

termination.title: 8. Suspension and Termination
termination.p1: We may suspend or terminate your access to our services at any time, for any reason, without prior notice.
termination.p2: You may stop using our services at any time.

liability.title: 9. Limitation of Liability
liability.p1: Our services are provided 'as is'. We do not guarantee that the website will always be available or error-free.
liability.p2: Our liability is limited to the maximum extent permitted by applicable law.

changes.title: 10. Changes to Terms
changes.p1: We may modify these terms at any time. Changes take effect immediately upon publication on the website.

contact.title: 11. Contact
contact.p1: For questions about these Terms of Use, contact us:
